author: Reuters Editorial
title: EFSF sends request for proposal for upcoming transaction
text: LONDON, Jan 31 (IFR) - EFSF, the European Financial Stability Facility (Aa1/AA/AA) has sent a request for proposal to a selection of banks from the EFSF/ESM Market Group with regards to an upcoming transaction scheduled for the week of February 5 2018, subject to market conditions. (Reporting by Helene Durand)
